endings.label: End of Demo
endings.description: You reach the end of our demo. Thanks for playing!

endings.label: Game Over
endings.description: One or more main character(s) perished.

endings.label: Game Over
endings.description: The tavern has no money left and has to close down.

endings.label: Game Over
endings.description: The tavern has no cook and has to close down.

endings.label: Game Over
endings.description: The new cook burned down the tavern. The taverner has clearly made the wrong choice!
